a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Years lived with disease or disability vs. GDP per capita, 2016
Expected years living with disability or disease versus gross domestic product (GDP) per capita, measured in constant
international-$ which correct for inflation and cross-country price differences.
Data source: Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation, Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
